channel.title: HTML template help
channel.description: Yeah i need help with getting templates onto the site. I can add like simple one color templates like red and black, but how do you add like different colored site templates? I know you download a template file, but then what? Hopefully i get an answer ;)

item.title: HTML template help
item.dc:creator: @Friday13th Friday13th
item.description:
@Friday13th wrote:

You have to make a link to a *.css file and in the css fie add all the colors and stuff

Read full topic

item.title: HTML template help
item.dc:creator: @itendsnow itendsnow
item.description:
@itendsnow wrote:

For what a forum? Or a wesbite? For a forum upload to your templates folder ands install from the admin panel, for a wesbite you need sets of different style sheets and then some javascript to allow users to swop styles.

Read full topic
